ch0250_00_saida/0101_0701_02_10:
I would be honored to be your opponent in
battle today.
ch0250_00_saida/7101_0701_01_10:
Pasio is amazing... The sync pairs here are
so strong.
ch0250_00_saida/7101_0701_02_10: I have to do my best and stay on top of things!
ch0250_00_saida/7101_0701_03_10:
I’ll train hard again today so I can keep
on winning!
ch0250_00_saida/7102_0701_01_10:
The land here on Pasio shows itself in many ways.
There are beaches, mountains, forests, cliffs...
ch0250_00_saida/7102_0701_02_10: That makes it perfect for self-training!
ch0250_00_saida/7102_0701_03_10:
I wonder if the person who built this island had
that in mind when designing Pasio.
ch0250_00_saida/7102_0701_04_10:
If so, perhaps I should let them know how grateful
I am, as a martial artist.
ch0250_00_saida/7103_0701_01_10:
I find that how you balance training and eating
is very important.
ch0250_00_saida/7103_0701_02_10:
After I finish my training, I quickly eat something
and rest my body!
ch0250_00_saida/7103_0701_03_10:
Changing my eating habits really makes a
difference in helping my body get stronger
more efficiently!
ch0250_00_saida/7104_0701_01_10:
My parents were quite strict. My upbringing is
how I became so strong.
ch0250_00_saida/7104_0701_02_10:
If I could make Galar karate more well-known
around the world...
ch0250_00_saida/7104_0701_03_10:
I think that would be the best way to thank them
for all they’ve done.
ch0250_00_saida/7105_0701_02_10:
Ack! [Name:PlayerNickname ]?! How long
have you been standing there?!
ch0250_00_saida/7105_0701_03_10:
W-were you surprised by that? Actually, I’m
rather fond of sweets.
ch0250_00_saida/7105_0701_04_10:
But it’s a bit embarrassing, so I’d appreciate it if
you didn’t tell anyone else...
ch0250_00_saida/1701_0701_02_10:
I’m sure it’ll be perfect for training with your
partner Pokémon!
ch0250_00_saida/1701_0702_01_10: Feel free to use that gift I gave you.
ch0250_00_saida/2501_0701_01_10: I wonder if I’m difficult to approach...
ch0250_00_saida/2501_0701_02_10:
Sometimes people say they can’t tell what
I’m thinking.
ch0250_00_saida/2501_0701_03_10:
But all I’m doing is being careful not to show any
weakness on my part.
ch0250_00_saida/2501_0702_01_10:
Although, now that I’ve said that, I suppose you
know my weakness.
ch0250_00_saida/2501_0702_02_10:
This is proof that my will is wavering...and a
weak will makes for a weak self.
ch0250_00_saida/2501_0702_03_10: I must train myself more to strengthen my will!
ch0250_00_saida/2511_0701_01_10:
I have a sweet tooth, but I try to keep it a secret
from other people.
ch0250_00_saida/2511_0701_02_10: But somehow, my fans figured it out.
ch0250_00_saida/2511_0701_03_10:
Now it’s become difficult for me to enjoy desserts
in secret at my favorite shops.
ch0250_00_saida/2511_0702_01_10: Do you know if Pasio has any good dessert shops?
ch0250_00_saida/2511_0702_02_10:
If you do, please let me know. Discreetly,
of course.
ch0250_00_saida/2511_0702_03_10:
You have to be careful so nobody finds out.
Do you understand?
ch0250_00_saida/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning. I’m about to go for a light six-mile
run. Care to join me?
ch0250_00_saida/3003_0701_01_10:
Hello. Are you feeling tired? When I’m tired in the
afternoon, I eat something sweet like ice cream
to perk me up.
ch0250_00_saida/3005_0701_01_10:
I like to talk to my partner Pokémon at night.
Even if he can’t understand my words, I’m sure he
understands the spirit of what I’m saying.
